item.title: Getting Started with Docker HEALTHCHECK Command
item.description: In this post, we will discuss what Docker HEALTHCHECK is, when it should be used, provide a code example to demonstrate how the HEALTHCHECK command works and how to debug it. The code is available here. What is Docker HEALTHCHECK Docker HEALTHCHECK is a command used to test the status of a container in a systematic way. The command runs periodically, and if it fails, the container is marked as unhealthy.
